snippet: The police in Hong Kong raided the offices of Uber, the ride-hailing service, and arrested five drivers on Tuesday for the “illegal use of vehicles for hire,” the authorities said.
abstract: Hong Kong police raid local Uber offices, arresting five drivers for 'illegal use of vehicles for hire'; drivers are accused of lacking permits and insurance.
lead_paragraph: The police in Hong Kong raided the offices of Uber, the ride-hailing service, and arrested five drivers on Tuesday for the “illegal use of vehicles for hire,” the authorities said.

headline.main: Uber Offices in Hong Kong Raided by the Police
headline.print_headline: Uber Offices in Hong Kong Raided by the Police
